name: Hexagonic - Mobile
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Press left or right to change rotating direction. Press again to disable.

 -You can switch between skins or songs from the shop button.

-Mute sound by pressing on the mute button.

-See other player progress by pressing the stats button.(coming soon)

-Change game modes by pressing the GameModes button.

RESOURCES:

Unity with C#.

PROJECT TIME:

It took 3 months(2 of them i was busy and i couldnt work for the game).

 CREDITS:
